chart_width.label: Chart Width
chart_width.helper_text: Set width to display all data clearly and completely.

bar_direction.label: Bar Direction
bar_direction.helper_text: Set bars to display horizontally or vertically.

grid_lines.label: Grid Lines
grid_lines.helper_text: Show or hide grid lines in the background of chart.

margin_settings.label: Margin Settings
margin_settings.helper_text: Adjust the chart's outer spacing to prevent overlap and ensure enough room for labels, titles, or legends.

background_color.label: Background Color
background_color.helper_text: Select background color for both chart display and saved image.

color_style.label: Color Style
color_style.helper_text: Select a pre-defined color palette for your chart.

bar_label_type.label: Bar Labels
bar_label_type.helper_text: Choose how values are displayed on each bar.

line_style.label: Line Style
line_style.helper_text: Choose how data points are connected on your line chart.

area_fill.label: Area Fill
area_fill.helper_text: Choose whether to show lines only or fill the area beneath lines.

pie_top_items.label: Pie Top Items
pie_top_items.helper_text: Show top N items and group others as 'Other'.

pie_inner_radius.label: Pie Inner Radius
pie_inner_radius.helper_text: Size of center hole (0% = pie, 50% = donut).

axis_range.label: Y-Axis Range
axis_range.helper_text: Set minimum and maximum values for the data axis scale.

x_axis.label: X-Axis
x_axis.helper_text: Choose how data points are distributed along the X-axis.

y_axis.label: Y-Axis
y_axis.helper_text: Choose how to space your data points on the Y-axis.

text.label: Text
text.helper_text: Text shown below X-axis (leave empty to hide).

y_offset.label: Vertical Offset
y_offset.helper_text: Vertical distance between X-axis and labels (larger moves down).

text.label: Text
text.helper_text: Text shown beside Y-axis (leave empty to hide).

x_offset.label: Horizontal Offset
x_offset.helper_text_primary: Horizontal distance between primary (left) Y-axis and labels (negative values moves left).
x_offset.helper_text: Horizontal distance between Y-axis and labels (negative values moves left).

text.label: Text
text.helper_text: Text shown beside Secondary (right) Y-axis (leave empty to hide).

x_offset.label: Horizontal Offset
x_offset.helper_text: Horizontal distance between secondary (right) Y-axis and labels (negative values moves left).

reference_line_settings.horizontal_helper_text: Add horizontal lines with custom labels, colors and X-axis values for data comparison.
reference_line_settings.vertical_helper_text: Add horizontal lines with custom labels, colors and Y-axis values for data comparison.

display_type.label: Display Format
display_type.helper_text: Choose how labels appear on pie chart segments.

min_percentage.label: Minimum Label Percentage
min_percentage.helper_text: Set the minimum percentage to display labels.

radius.label: Label Position
radius.helper_text: Distance from center (50% = halfway from center).

legend_settings.label: Legend Settings
legend_settings.helper_text: Control legend display, position and spacing options for better readability.
